title: Sunrype Sans Serif Font(s)
content:
Can someone ID the font used on these juice bottles (the names:mango tangerine).  
 [http://www.savvymom.ca/images/uploads/sunrypejuices.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021903/http:/www.savvymom.ca/images/uploads/sunrypejuices.jpg "http://www.savvymom.ca/images/uploads/sunrypejuices.jpg")

...and the one used on the website? Thanks.  
 [http://www.sunrype.ca/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021903/http:/www.sunrype.ca/ "http://www.sunrype.ca/")
author: Nunymare

comments.content: It’s a tiny sample but the typeface on the bottle definitely looks like [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021903/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100008). And the sans on the website is just that: [TheSans](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021903/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesans/thesans/).
Thanks. I’m going to try to find a bigger sample for the bottle...not sure about that one.

Try using Google ’image’ search for “Sun-Rype”. This one pops right up on the first page and wow it’s from the agency that designed it. ;)

[http://www.karacters.com/work?id=27&PHPSESSID=6d0c40b0438b3d178dde6f477f...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021903/http:/www.karacters.com/work?id=27&PHPSESSID=6d0c40b0438b3d178dde6f477f7bbb87 "http://www.karacters.com/work?id=27&PHPSESSID=6d0c40b0438b3d178dde6f477f7bbb87")

Hi, I’m part of the team that works on Sun-Rype’s packaging and advertising campaigns. The font we use for the flavour names is called “Gotham”. I hope that answers your question. Thanks for your interest!
